author: Life of Boris
description:
big meat for big appetite.
Learn how to make the JUICIEST Slavic Pork Neck Oven Roast!
This is a simple, cheap, and delicious pork neck recipe anyone can cook.
Perfect for budget cooking, easy meals, and classic Slavic home-style food.

In this video I show you:
✔ How to marinate pork neck the Slavic way
✔ How to roast it until soft & juicy
✔ How to make potatoes that cook in meat juices
✔ Cheap ingredients you can find anywhere
✔ Simple steps anyone can follow

This recipe works in any oven, even small rental kitchens.
Enjoy, my friend!

Music by Boris & The Balalaikas:
https://open.spotify.com/artist/4rD9iKpk9Ed3AruBdsEY9G?si=kSGHEfkGRzKTEjj_0j561g
(if track not out yet, it will be soon)
